question:
Arrange the following events chronologically
1. Establishment of Yugantar Party
2. Mr. Allen was shot
3. Alipore Bombing Conspiracy
4. Khudi Ram threw a bomb on Mrs. Kennedy and Miss Kennedy
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Yugantar Party was established in 1906 by Aurobindo Ghosh, Barin Ghosh (Brother of Aurobindo), Bhupendranath Datta, Raja Subodh Mallik. Mr. Allen was shot on 25th December 1907. Khudi Ram threw a bomb on Mrs. Kennedy and Miss Kennedy on 30th April 1908. Alipore Bombing Conspiracy started in 1908. Khudiram was hanged on 11th August 1908.
